text: @SecPompeo @realDonaldTrump You both are so full of shit. Grow up and get some real leaders to handle this and sit your pathetic asses down. Shame on you awful pieces of shit. #CoronavirusPandemic #WhereAreTheTests #WhereAreTheTestKits
